title: Brussels Sprouts With Pancetta, Pine Nuts And Parmigiano Reggiano
summary: Need a gluten free main course? Brussels Sprouts With Pancetta, Pine Nuts And Parmigiano Reggiano could be an awesome recipe to try. This recipe makes 1 servings with 542 calories, 24g of protein, and 35g of fat each. For $5.85 per serving, this recipe covers 42% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. If you have brussels sprouts, oil, parmigiano reggiano, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the oil you could follow this main course with the Vegan Mango Banana Bread as a dessert. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 25 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 84%. This score is excellent. Similar recipes are Brussels Sprouts With Pancettan And Parmigiano Reggiano, Brussels Sprouts with Pancetta, Cranberries & Pine Nuts, and Brussels Sprouts with Pine Nuts.
